name: RILIAZA
description:
Humanity died out in a zombie apocalypse, and robots inherited the earth. The only thing standing between them and the zombie hordes are the walls of their cities and their guns. Play as a robot hero on a mission to deliver a power core to a nearby settlement that lost its power.

Music: Never Return (Instrumental Version) - Carvings (licensed from EpidemicSound)

Font: Heartbit by Void
